headline: Altria (MO) Rises As Market Takes a Dip: Key Facts
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Altria (MO) stood at $57.89, denoting a +1.35% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Q4 Earnings Highlights: Boston Beer (NYSE:SAM) Vs The Rest Of The Beverages, Alcohol, and Tobacco Stocks
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Boston Beer (NYSE:SAM) and the best and worst performers in the beverages, alcohol, and tobacco industry.
